name: fuckyoufriday
text: "That is like backwards divided by two". I will turn you gay and gay marriage you, Roast Beef.

name: riazm
text:
I'm going to turn him gay, then turn myself gay, THEN gay marriage him.

Guess you've got a headstart on me.

name: semiquaver
text: It would be easier to turn me Roast Beef than turn Roast Beef gay.  FYF...?

name: i_love_kate
text: Fuck your friends!

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I'm not gay for men, just Beef.

name: rowboat
text: Never had you pegged as a meat fetishist.

text: If you do not like words, Achewood may not be the right choice for you.

name: connellingus
text: Bigger version here . This interview goes on longer and gets better in the 'zine. Cornelius telling the story of how he met Iris was really cute.

text: I caught that too.  "Metrodors."  That's an interesting take on T, there, Roast Beef.  But apt.

text:
Next what??? What do I do next, Cornelius?

My guess: "next time."

name: soticoto
text: Pragmacticality is my word of the day.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Teodor: Got kicked out of my one-man band.
Molly: The Achewood A-List! November 1, 2006
Onstad: Golf Memoir No. 4. The food.

name: anzio
text: "...On our way home we ran into Ray, in full costume as a peacock with spats, a top hat, and a calling card. He said he was "Peacock Pimp: The Most Beautiful Pimp In The Ghetto," and I believed him. I asked Beef later, and he said that he had believed him as well." Man, it is totally worth it to read these blogs. Anyone one passes them up are such as a fool.

name: achilleselbow
text: From my mediocre French I got the idea that cote de boeuf a la incendienne means "flaming side of beef". Which doesn't necessarily sound all that classy. I think Roast Beef is displaying that he is of low taste.

name: howl
text: Oh my goodness the caption inside the white space is "what death looks like"

name: howl
text: I think

name: tekende
text: Man, now I want a waffle. That sounds like a great thing tonight.

name: st_elmos_fire
text:
Cornelius Bear, to all intents and purposes, is the man

The man in a good way, the man in the bad way is the Man
